###### Things To Do
<div align="left">
**The Houston Zoo**
<div class="nobullet">
* 6200 Hermann Park Dr., Houston, TX 77030
* The 2nd most visited zoo in the US and home to over 6,000 animals ([Visit](https://www.houstonzoo.org))
</div>
**Space Center Houston**
<div class="nobullet">
* 1601 NASA Pkwy., Houston, TX 77058
* Two words: outer space ([Visit](https://spacecenter.org/))
</div>
**Houston Museum District**
<div class="nobullet">
* Includes 19 museums in 4 zones ([Visit](https://houmuse.org/))
* Crystal's favorite: The museum of natural science
</div>
</div>
